title: Lament Over Fallen Jerusalem
description:
Readings from:
Lamentations 1:1-2; 3:18-26
Today's passages were read by Kaitlyn Opperman. Kaitlyn is the wife of a youth pastor and the mother of two busy, busy toddlers. They live in Elizabeth, Colorado.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
